docs.title: Welcome to CodeInfinity
docs.text: Welcome to CodeInfinity! We're excited to have you on board. This guide will help you get started with CodeInfinity.

docs.title: Get started with YouCoach
docs.text: Welcome to YouCoach! We're excited to have you on board. This guide will help you get started with YouCoach.

docs.title: Pre-requisites
docs.text:
Before you start using YouCoach, make sure you have the following:

  • Pycharm
  • Python 3.12
  • RAD Studio 10.4.2

docs.title: Installation?
docs.text:
Download and install python 3.12 ...

Windows

python -m venv api\venv
api\venv\Scripts\activate
pip install poetry

Next we need to install the dependencies

cd api
poetry install

docs.title: Running ?
docs.text:
Running the api is simple

Windows

cd api
poetry run python app.py
